name: I Need to Escape From the World and Give Gifts
name_original: I Need to Escape From the World and Give Gifts
description:
This game is 64 bit only that means this game will only run on 64 bit operating systems and a processor.

Controls

Space bar Jump.

Move WASD Keys.

Shoot K.

To restart and die R.

A Christmas platformer game and it's to late for Christmas !

This game toke me 3 weeks to make.

I think a WebGL version is coming soon so you can play it with no download you need a high-end PC to run this game is will lag so much.
